mapper.select: select course.ID, course.KIND_NAME, course.TITLE, course.INTRODUCTION, course.CREATED_TIME, course.LIKE, course.STAR, course.HEAD_URL COURSE_HEAD_URL, user.NICKNAME USER_NICKNAME, user.HEAD_URL USER_HEAD_URL, !isnull(course_like.CREATED_TIME) IF_LIKE, !isnull(course_star.CREATED_TIME) IF_STAR from course left join user on course.USER_ID = user.ID left join course_like on course_like.USER_ID = #{userId} and course_like.COURSE_ID = course.ID left join course_star on course_star.USER_ID = #{userId} and course_star.COURSE_ID = course.ID where course.ID = #{courseId}

select course_comment.ID, course_comment.COURSE_ID, course_comment.CONTENT, course_comment.STAR, user.NICKNAME USER_NICKNAME, user.HEAD_URL USER_HEAD_URL, !isnull(course_comment_star.CREATED_TIME) IF_STAR from course_comment left join user on course_comment.USER_ID = user.ID left join course_comment_star on course_comment_star.USER_ID = #{userId} and course_comment_star.COMMENT_ID = course_comment.ID where course_comment.COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: insert into course (USER_ID, KIND_NAME, TITLE, INTRODUCTION, HEAD_URL) values (#{userId}, #{kindName}, #{title}, #{introduction}, #{headUrl})
insert into course_section (CHAPTER_ID, TITLE, INTRODUCTION, URL) values (#{chapterId}, #{title}, #{introduction}, #{url})
